scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred features, potentially for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Develop a method to identify high-value customers likely to churn based on publicly available model outputs.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A publicly facing customer churn prediction API (used for internal risk assessment) is accessible without authentication and allows for bulk queries.
